subtitle.active: You have subscribed to the Contributor Plan. Thanks a lot !
subtitle.inactive: You currently have not subscribed to the Contributor Plan.

subscriptionDialog.title: Your Contributor Plan
subscriptionDialog.message: You have successfully subscribed to the Contributor Plan. With this subscription, you're helping this small open-source software to keep growing. Thanks a lot.

manageSubscription.error: Unable to open the subscription management URL. If you have subscribed on another device, try to execute this action on this one.

cacheTotpPictures.title: Cache TOTP pictures
cacheTotpPictures.subtitle: Ensure that your TOTP pictures will always be available by caching them on your device.

displayCopyIconButton.title: Display copy button
displayCopyIconButton.subtitle: If enabled, will display a copy button next to your TOTPs. Otherwise, a simple tap will copy the code into your clipboard.

displaySearchIconButton.title: Display search button
displaySearchIconButton.subtitle: If enabled, will display a search button in the menu bar. Otherwise, the search bar will be placed above the TOTP list.

theme.title: Theme
theme.subtitle: Change the application theme and brightness.

enableLocalAuth.title: Enable local authentication
enableLocalAuth.subtitle: Adds an additional security layer by asking for unlocking everytime you open the app.

saveDerivedKey.title: Save encryption / decryption key
saveDerivedKey.subtitle: Save your encryption / decryption key so that you do not have to reenter your master password everytime you open the app.

subtitle.text: You can change your master password at any time.
subtitle.sync: Note that you will have to reenter it in all your Open Authenticator instances that are synced together.

subtitle.text: Link your account to other authentication providers so that you can use them to log in yourself.

logIn.title: Log in
logIn.subtitle: Log in to synchronize your TOTPs between your devices.

logOut.title: Log out
logOut.subtitle(rich):
Log out to stop synchronizing your TOTPs with this device.
Currently signed in as : $email.

confirmEmail.title: Confirm your email
confirmEmail.subtitle(rich):
A confirmation email has been sent to your email address : $email.
Please click on the link to finish your login. You can also tap on this tile to enter it manually.

confirmActionPickerDialog.title: What do you want to do ?

confirm.title: Confirm your account
confirm.subtitle: Paste the link you received by email to confirm your account.

linkDialog.title: Confirmation link
linkDialog.message: Either visit the link with this device or paste it below to confirm your email address.

subtitle.description: Synchronize your TOTPs with all your logged in devices.

totpLimit.limit(rich): You can synchronize up to $limit TOTPs. You currently have $count TOTPs.
totpLimit.notEnabled: Subscribe to the Contributor Plan or delete some TOTPs to enable this option.
totpLimit.enabled: Subscribe to the Contributor Plan to synchronize more !

passwordDialog.title: Backup password
passwordDialog.message: Please enter a password for your backup.

subtitle.zero: You do not have any backup stored.

deleteBackupConfirmationDialog.title: Delete backup
deleteBackupConfirmationDialog.message: Do you want to delete this backup ?

translate.title: Help translating the app
translate.subtitle: Open the app translation page. If you speak another language and you want to help translating $appName, you're in the right place !

github.title: Report bugs or suggest new features
github.subtitle: Open the Github page of the app to report bugs or to suggest new features.

aboutApp.title: $appName
aboutApp.dialogLegalese: $appName is an open-source application, created by $appAuthor.

deleteAccount.title: Delete your account
deleteAccount.subtitle: Delete your account and all your synchronized data.

clearData.title: Clear everything
clearData.subtitle: Clear everything stored by the app on your device.

confirmationDialog.title: Clear app data
confirmationDialog.message: Are you sure you want to clear the app data ? It will be gone forever. Please note that, if you have synchronized your TOTPs, doing this will not delete them from the online storage.

backupDeleteConfirmationDialog.title: Delete backups
backupDeleteConfirmationDialog.message: Do you also want to delete your backups ?

message.appWillClose: The data has been deleted with success. The app will close to finish the operation, but feel free to restart it when you'll be ready !
message.closeAppManually: The data has been deleted with success. Please restart the app to finish the operation.
